data.title: Why did Hinduism survive in Bali but disappeared in the rest of Southeast Asia?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 6): This question came from a flawed/incomplete understanding of reality. Hinduism NEVER “disappeared” in Southeast Asia EVER.

Hinduism is dominant in Bali, yes true. However, it does NOT “disappeared” in the rest of Southeast Asia. In fact Hinduism has millions of adherents in Indo...
